keyMoments.title: Squard Stabs Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Manipulated by Akainu, Squard betrays Whitebeard by stabbing him through the chest, believing that Whitebeard made a deal with the Marines to sacrifice the allied pirates to save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: This shocking betrayal is a pivotal moment in the Marineford War, demonstrating the effectiveness of the Marines' psychological warfare and testing Whitebeard's character and love for his 'sons'.

relationships.description: Squard was an allied pirate captain under Whitebeard's protection and considered Whitebeard a father figure, until he was manipulated by Akainu into believing Whitebeard betrayed him.

evolutionMoments.description: Squard stabs Whitebeard after being deceived by Akainu into thinking Whitebeard made a deal to sacrifice the allied pirates.

relationships.description: Akainu manipulated Squard by exploiting his grudge against Gol D. Roger (whose crew killed Squard's original crew) and convincing him that Whitebeard betrayed the allied pirates.

reveals.information: Squard holds a grudge against Gol D. Roger because Roger's crew destroyed his original pirate crew years ago. Akainu exploited this grudge by reminding Squard that Ace is Roger's son.
Squard can be manipulated through psychological warfare, showing his vulnerability despite his status as a New World pirate captain.

keyMoments.title: Izou Saves Luffy
keyMoments.description: Izou, the 16th Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, saves Luffy from an attacking Marine and urges him to continue forward toward Ace.
keyMoments.significance: This is Izou's first significant action in the Marineford War, establishing him as an active ally supporting Luffy's mission to save Ace. It demonstrates the Whitebeard Pirates' respect for Luffy's determination.

abilities.description: Izou is skilled in using dual flintlock pistols in combat.

relationships.description: Izou serves as the 16th Division Commander under Whitebeard and considers him a father figure.
Izou assists Luffy during the Marineford War, recognizing his determination to save Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Izou saves Luffy from a Marine attack and encourages him to continue forward.

reveals.information: Izou is the 16th Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
Izou uses dual flintlock pistols as his weapons of choice.

keyMoments.title: Sentomaru Commands Pacifista Army at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Sentomaru arrives at Marineford commanding an army of at least twenty Pacifista units, executing Sengoku's plan to devastate Whitebeard's allied pirate crews.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sentomaru's authority and importance as the commander of Dr. Vegapunk's Pacifista army. This is the largest deployment of Pacifista shown in the series to date.

affiliations.role: Pacifista Commander / Bodyguard of Dr. Vegapunk

reveals.information: Sentomaru commands the entire Pacifista army and can deploy them en masse for large-scale operations like the Marineford War.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Faces Admiral Kizaru
keyMoments.description: While charging toward Ace, Luffy is intercepted by Admiral Kizaru. The encounter highlights the vast power difference between Luffy and the Admirals.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes how outmatched Luffy is at Marineford and the overwhelming danger he faces in his attempt to save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Izou Saves Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy is saved from a Marine attack by Izou, who encourages him to keep moving forward toward Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Luffy's determination has earned him allies among the Whitebeard Pirates who actively support his mission.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Witnesses Squard's Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Luffy watches in shock as Squard stabs Whitebeard, witnessing one of the most devastating moments of the war.
keyMoments.significance: This traumatic moment adds to the psychological toll the war takes on Luffy and demonstrates the cruelty of the Marines' tactics.

name.japanese: エドワード・ニューゲート

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard is Stabbed by Squard
keyMoments.description: Whitebeard is suddenly stabbed through the chest by Squard, one of his allied pirate captains who was manipulated by Akainu into believing Whitebeard had betrayed them all.
keyMoments.significance: This is a critical moment that tests Whitebeard's character and his philosophy of family. Despite being betrayed and wounded, this sets up his ultimate forgiveness of Squard and reaffirmation of his love for his 'sons'.

relationships.description: Whitebeard treated Squard as one of his 'sons' and protected his crew as an allied captain, though Squard was manipulated into betraying him.

evolutionMoments.description: Squard, deceived by Akainu, stabs Whitebeard believing he was betrayed.

reveals.information: Despite his immense power, Whitebeard can be wounded and is vulnerable to betrayal from those he trusts, especially when caught off guard by an ally.
